text:
If you could start your agency over today, what would you remove or simplify to make it run better in the future?

Things aren’t going back to what they were, so why not grab the chance to come back leaner, stronger fitter, right?
Hello, I’m using the Contacts API but having troubles to get the traffic source right – even though I’m sending `context.hutk` along the data – is anyone here familiar with the forms api?

Hey <@U0126S93970> a couple of questions:
1. Are you talking about the Contacts API or the Forms API?  Only the Forms API supports appending the cookie data
2. If you are using the Forms API, which version are you using v2 or v3? The format is different between the two
3. Any examples you can share about what you are sending into the API will help us troubleshoot
Hey Zack, thanks for reaching out. I’ve found the issue… My IP was tagged as “internal” – so my page visit wasn’t tracked. When I’ve tested it via mobile network it works as expected
ah gotcha, IP filtering has gotten me a couple of times too :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi, Im using the blog filter module, but my 'all' filter button is breaking to the next line. I would like it inline with the other filter buttons. Does anyone have experience with this?
Here is my preview link: <https://app.HubSpot.com/design-previewer/875116/templates/28246293461>
Hi Emily, please provide the preview link without display options. This link requires login.

here it is: <https://preview.hs-sites.com/_hcms/preview/template/multi?blog_listing=true&content_group_id=null&is_buffered_template_layout=true&portalId=875116&tc_deviceCategory=undefined&template_layout_id=28246293461&updated=1587663955407>
Now I my issue is when I press 'all' the tags display vertical, I would like them to display horizontal
Hey!
i didn't see this reply before, sorry about that!
but basically yeah I found that out and that was the solution :slightly_smiling_face:
thanks for your help

Hi guys! I'm getting started with sending timeline events. I'm digging the API but had a question.
Is it possible to create multiple <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/timeline/create-or-update-event|timeline events> on a company for something that happens multiple times?
e.g. user "Views Awesome Dashboard" mutliple times a day can I have separate timeline entries for each visit?
not sure how many agency owners are in here....
no problem, ping me if you need some help on this, I've beat my head a few times into pardot forms

Has anyone here used the Wordpress plugin Hub2Word? I’m trying to use it to incorporate HubSpot blog posts into the search results of a Wordpress site. The plugin is not supported apparently and hasn’t been updated for awhile. No support for PHP7 it appears. I’ve addressed a number of notices in the plugin, but can’t get over the final hump. I do know it’s pulling the data from HubSpot. Just not displaying yet. Some other changes are probably still needed for php7. 

Anyone have experience with this??
I don't have experience with that plugin but I've done quite a few things with HubSpot apis and wordpress plugins, I also can help debug those php errors and see what is going on
I don't have time tomorrow, but for sure next week I will if you want a hand
Heads up, looks like HubSpot is down / partially down
(back up)
